trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> objects with CodeDOM serialization services.
trans-unit.target: Fornece objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> com os serviços de serialização de CodeDOM.

trans-unit.source: This is the base class from which other CodeDOM serializers, such as the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer" />, are inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a classe base da qual outros serializadores CodeDOM, tais como o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer" />, são herdados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer> controls the generation of component initialization code for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer> Controla a geração de código de inicialização do componente para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject> classe em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use during serialization.
trans-unit.target: O gerenciador de serialização a ser usado durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified object into a CodeDOM object.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o objeto especificado em um objeto CodeDOM.

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM object that represents the object that has been serialized.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto CodeDOM que representa o objeto que foi serializado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="obj" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> ou <paramref name="obj" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> não pode ser convertido para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
